body_html:
When configuring with all default option that is all No it worked. Its only occurs when in configuration I select for VERBS support I guess
I have checked the code of the file /tensorflow/contrib/verbs/rdma.h and its including infiniband/verbs.h
#include <infiniband/verbs.h>
But there is no such file anywhere.

body:
When configuring with all default option that is all No it worked. Its only occurs when in configuration I select for **VERBS support** I guess
I have checked the code of the file /tensorflow/contrib/verbs/rdma.h and its including infiniband/verbs.h
`#include <infiniband/verbs.h>`
But there is no such file anywhere.
